InfluenceRule.name: Competitive people love to show off
Ripped people love to show off
Arrogant people love to show off
Domineering people like to show off
Confident people like to show off
Attention hogs love to show off
Shy people dislike showing off
Clumsy people dislike showing off
Insecure people dislike showing off
Mopey people dislike showing off
Humble people hate showing off
Pacifists dislike showing off
Cheerful people like showing off
Class clowns like showing off
Shaken people dislike like showing off
Sad people hate showing off
Guilty people dislike showing off
Like showing off to someone you want to pick on
Like showing off to someone you have a crush on
Dislike showing off to someone you're scared of
Like showing off to someone you're interested in
Like showing off to someone you don't think is cool
Competitive people love to show off
attention hogs don't like to be showed off to
cold people don't like to be showed off to
kind people respond positively to showing off
sympathetic people respond positively to showing off
mean people don't like to be showed off to
insecure people don't like to be showed off to
oblivious people aren't impressed by show-offs
competitive people aren't impressed by show-offs
people feeling bad aren't impressed by show-offs
people feeling good might be charitable to show-offs
feeling good about a person might make you charitable to show-off
feeling bad about a person might make you less charitable to show-off
Less impressed by someone who's done something negative to you
ripped people more impressed by direct showing off
dumb people more impressed by direct showing off

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %ip% skill with the lightsaber failed to impress %r%
%i% did that gross double-jointed thing in front of %r%
%i% tried to show off %pron(i,his/her)% new %CKB_((i,has),(r,dislikes),())% but %r% %pron(r,was/were)%n't into it
%i% showed off that %CKB_((i,likes),(r,likes),())%-based cellphone game to %r%
%r% helped %i% get the word out about that underground phenom
%i% got the smack down when trying to show off to %r%
%i% tried to interest %r% in a perfectly innocent drink with no subtext whatsoever
%i% tried to interest %r% in a perfectly innocent drink with no subtext whatsoever

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... %random(check out this sketch I did of Ms. Pagels,.check it out. I drew Guernica on my arm in social studies today,check out this awesome origami three-toed sloth I made,check out this miniature Mona Lisa I drew on my hand. It's like she's winking.,check this out. I carved my number 2 pencil into a shank in math class today,watch this. I can tie my fingers into a square knot)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Hehe,Wow,Cool,Groovy,Rad,No way,Hella cool)%. %random(That's actually pretty sweet,That's crazy sauce,That's not bad actually,That's actually surprisingly good,I'm pretty impressed actually)%. You've got %random(skills,skillz,mad skills,talent)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... check this out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think that was the single lamest thing I've ever seen.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! %greeting%! I was, uh, just coming back from the gym.
Yeah, just workin those pecs.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh my.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Anyway, catch you later.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I hope so!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! %greeting%! I just got back from an appointment with my stylist.
Yeah, Dominique always says my hair is so soft and luxurious.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, cool.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Anyway, gotta run. Laterz!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(i,His,Her)% hair is so much cooler than mine...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... %random(check out these guns.,want to take a trip to the gun show?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nice, %gender(i,bro,babe)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... I just got a new hat, what do you think?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r,That's sweet man,Oh how cute)%. It looks a lot like your old one.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But better!
Hey %r%, check it out. I got an A minus on my Bio final!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah? Well right now I'm getting a D minus in giving a damn.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're getting an F in Shut the Hell Up.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(i,Jerk,Prima Donna)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, check it out... did you know I was double jointed?
I just push against the elbow and...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Gross! I am so not in the mood for that right now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Geez, what's %pron(r,his/her)% problem?
Hey %r%, check out this vintage %toc1% I scored off Auctionator. Isn't it rad?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, I guess. I'm not really into %toc1%s.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: WHAT? Are you SERIOUS? How could you not be into this amount of awesome?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Chill out,Get a life,Calm down)%, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Check out this %positiveadj% new game I got on my phone. It's called '%toc1% %random(destroyer,attack,mayhem,adventure,quest,tycoon)%.'
It's totally cool %toc1% action and the graphics are %random(sick,totally ill)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Wow,Yeah,Hey)%, that%random('s pretty neat, looks awesome, looks like fun, looks sweet)%. We should do multiplayer some time.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What's up, %buddy%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Not a whole lot,Just living the dream,Freaking out about finals,Just thinking about the Prom,Just keeping it real)%. You?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm still working on %random(those poems,my tan line,this origami ostrich,that short story about death and stuff,that screenplay about a bunch of kids in high school in the week before the Prom)%.
Wanna see?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, %buddy%, looking good. It's really coming along.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nah, it sucks. But thanks for saying that. You're a good friend.
%greeting%, %r%. Uh... I don't know if you're interested, but... I have kind of a large collection of %toc1%s that I thought you might be interested in seeing sometime.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%, that's so sa... I mean, so special! That's so special that you collect things.
I would love to see your little collection except I... uh... I have class.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't patronize me.

Oh, hello, %r%. Have you seen %random(how many pledges for votes I've gotten to be Prom Royalty this year?,how many signatures my yearbooks have? I say yearbooks because I've had to expand to several additional volumes to hold all the adoring comments.,my new car? My parents totally got it for me because the one I got for my sixteenth birthday is so old-fashioned now.,that stage crew guy? I need him to approve these additional lights for my coronation speech at the prom and I assumed you know him since you're both so unpopular.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Enjoy your popularity now, %pejorative%. We'll see who's laughing when I'm a %random(successful small business owner,Fortune 500 executive,world-famous celebrity)% and you're %random(working the graveyard shift at a gas station,an alcoholic greeter at a warehouse store,chain smoking your way through raising half a dozen kids,in jail for tax fraud)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My, somebody's testy.

Hey %r%, check it out. %random(I found this awesome new indie band,I found this hilarious new blog,There's this totally chill new diner in town I discovered,There's this rad new used clothing store around the corner I found)% and I figured a cool %gender(r,cat,kitten)% like you could get the word around.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You found these guys? Cool, I'll check it out and do some name dropping if they're legit.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sweet. You're a rockstar.

Instantiation.name: ShowOff - Cute people know they're cute Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Gosh I'm cute.
I'm just so cute. Look at me, I'm flippin' %gender(i,handsome,adorable)%!.
Call me cute?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...You're cute...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Gosh I'm cute.

Instantiation.name: ShowOff - Cute people know they're cute Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Gosh I'm cute.
No no, you're supposed to agree.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...But I don't.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're supposed to agree anyway.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's too bad, then.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... %random(check out this sketch I did of Ms. Pagels,.check it out. I drew Guernica on my arm in social studies today,check out this awesome origami three-toed sloth I made,check out this miniature Mona Lisa I drew on my hand. It's like she's winking.,check this out. I carved my number 2 pencil into a shank in math class today,watch this. I can tie my fingers into a square knot)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(That's boring,I've seen better,So not interested,I'm actually kind of busy)%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Whatever,Fine,I see,That's cool)%.

Hey %r%... check out this %random(cool henna I got on my arm this morning.,pattern I drew on my arm. I'm thinking of maybe getting it as a tattoo after graduation.,fabric I picked up. Don't you think you could make an awesome scarf out of this?)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %if(0,Oh that's super cute! You have such a good eye for that.)else(Whoah! Nice. You've got like good style or whatever.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know you won't appreciate this, %r%, but %random(for your information,I just thought you should know,check it out)%, %random(after years of evolution I've finally perfected my outfit,I'm now definitely better looking than you'll ever be,I'm at my physical prime while you're already getting eye wrinkles and back fat)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So %random(boring,predictable,childish)%, %i%. Why don't you go bother someone who cares?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, let me fix you a drink. What do you want?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Oh god, %i%, not again with the drinks.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm just trying to offer our friend a drink, %o%. Hey %r%, what about a martini? All the young, cool, not-having-a-midlife-crisis kids are drinking them.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Please, %i%, our guest doesn't want anything fancy like that.
%r%, what about just a nice glass of cool, nonconfrontational water?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... I don't really... uh... well.... maybe a gin and tonic on the rocks?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How about beers all around!
%r%, let me fix you a drink. What do you want?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Oh god, %i%, not again with the drinks.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm just trying to offer our friend a drink, %o%. Hey %r%, what about a martini? All the young, cool, not-having-a-midlife-crisis kids are drinking them.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Please, %i%, our guest doesn't want anything fancy like that.
%r%, what about just a nice glass of cool, nonconfrontational water?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... I don't really... uh... well.... sure, a martini sounds great.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Alright! One martini coming up!
